Name: Nginx
Author: contacta@tnsjesper.xyz
InstallScript:
#!/bin/bash

cd /mnt/server

apt update -y

echo "Download Packages"

apt install unzip curl php-fpm -y

echo "Pull Nginx Files"
curl -L -o nginx.zip https://github.com/TNSStudio-HQ/MoonlightDockerImages/raw/main/installer/nginx/server-files/nginx.zip


echo "Unzipping nginx.zip..."
unzip nginx.zip
echo "Removeing Files"
rm -r nginx.zip

echo "Chmod Serverfiles"  
chmod -R 777 start.sh

echo "Ready to Launch"
